short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reduces YouTube interface to the bare minimum

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Simplify YouTube by removing distractions and making content immersive

_________________________________________________________
WATCH PAGE:
- Makes watch page in theatre mode fill the browser tab (simply scroll down for other content)
- Hides video overlays until you hover over the video
- Shows a big replay video button at end of video instead of suggested videos
- Pushes chat on live streams below the fold

_________________________________________________________
HOME PAGE:
- Hides the home feed by default (you can click to show it)
- Hide the nav if minimized

_________________________________________________________
PRIVACY POLICY

We take the strictest stance on privacy and security possible. Simplify's products have no ads, no analytics, no trackers, no cookies, and do not send or receive personal information of any kind from your account or device. We use no libraries or 3rd party code. Our full privacy policy is at https://simpl.fyi/privacy
